_source.short_desc:
Workforce Analytics for the Modern ?Workplace
Understand how your team works - from everywhere! Empower your people, hone healthy work
_source.long_desc: ActivTrak's workforce analytics provide predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace. This work is supported by the ActivTrak Productivity Lab, a global center for ground-breaking research and expertise that leverages data sourced from more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users.
_source.pricing_details:
Free $0 user/month
Advanced - $9 user/month billed annually
Premium - $15 user/month billed annually
_source.target_audience: Our target market includes any small to large-sized fortune 1000 company with 5-1000+ employees with computers. Ideally, business owners, IT managers, HR managers, and team leaders in need of results.

category_features.name: Data Management
category_features.definition: Ability to handle large datasets

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

related_products.short_desc: Design and publish anything in a few clicks. From brochure to video, access thousands of templates, images, videos, and more for free.
related_products.features: Design isn't just for designers. It's for anyone with ideas to share. Canva is the online platform that makes designing anything easy, for every individual and team. With thousands of professionally made templates to get you started, you can create, customize, and share your designs in a few clicks. From stickers to professional brochures, stunning videos to workplace presentations, it's never been easier to achieve your design goals.

related_products.short_desc: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution that helps visualize data-connected business process flows, empower remote teamwork, and more
related_products.features: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution with a robust library of templates and shapes, data connectivity capabilities, and integrated collaboration tools to empower remote workers and teams anywhere. Create impactful visualizations using provided shapes and starter files.  Edit diagrams stored online simultaneously with colleagues through a web browser to work with others anywhere securely and effortlessly. Even connect diagrams to real-time data to make decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense is a full-scale reporting & analytics solution that lets business users visualize, explore & drive insights from complex data
related_products.features: Sisense goes beyond traditional business intelligence by providing organizations with the ability to infuse analytics everywhere, embedded in both customer and employee applications and workflows. Sisense customers are breaking through the barriers of analytics adoption by going beyond the dashboard with Sisense Fusion - the highly customizable, AI-driven analytics cloud platform, that infuses intelligence at the right place and the right time, every time.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful statistical software everyone can use to analyze data and find meaningful solutions to their toughest business problems.
related_products.features: Minitab Statistical Software is a powerful statistical software everyone can use from anywhere. Visualize, analyze and harness the power of data with Minitab. Our comprehensive and trusted analyses combined with unparalleled ease-of-use make it simple to get deep, accurate insights. From quality and reliability engineering to product development, business and predictive analytics to process validation, Minitab is your partner to help solve your toughest challenges and bring your success to life.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your business data.
related_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Domo?s visualization tools enable a consolidated view so you can easily conduct analysis, create interactive visualizations, and unders
related_products.features: Domo visualization tools enable a consolidated view so you can easily conduct analysis, create interactive visualizations, and understand, tell, and share real-time stories about your business. Create pie charts, graphs, interactive maps, and other visualizations of your data with just a few clicks. When you upload a data source, Domo Analyzer tool suggests a visualization for you to get you started.

related_products.short_desc: Qlik Sense is a business intelligence (BI) and data visualization platform that helps global enterprises move faster and work smarter.
related_products.features: Qlik Sense is world-class data visualization software that helps global enterprises move faster, work smarter and put modern analytics in everyone's hands. Easily combine, load, visualize, and explore data, no matter how large (or small). Create and share powerful, interactive dashboards in a governable environment. Get unmatched performance and scalability on enterprise SaaS, your cloud of choice, or on-premises. Accelerate your path to business value with the most complete BI platform.

related_products.short_desc: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.
related_products.features: Marketing attribution software allows businesses to track the impact of every customer interaction they participate in.

similar_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your business data.
similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: A SaaS based reporting solution that helps digital marketers build reports with PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, all in a few seconds.
similar_products.features:
DataMyth is a SaaS based reporting solution which helps digital marketers generate reports with AUTOMATED ANALYSIS & PERFORMANCE INSIGHTS in writing, which helps marketers understand what is working & what is not.  Marketers can save all the time spent building reports and analysing the data, and get the reports in a few seconds. 

With the time saved, digital marketers can focus on optimization & strategy while we take care of all reporting needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform built to reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users.
similar_products.features:
Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform with one goal in mind: reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users. 

The Toucan team has worked from day one to make every experience on the platform simple, fast, and understandable even for complex tasks. As a result, Toucan sees the highest user adoption in the industry at 90%.

Toucan is designed for business leaders and business analysts who need to make decisions quickly and on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: JMP is the data analysis tool of choice for hundreds of thousands of scientists, engineers and other data explorers worldwide.
similar_products.features:
JMP, data analysis software for Mac and Windows, combines the strength of interactive visualization with powerful statistics.  

Importing and processing data is easy. The drag-and-drop interface, dynamically linked graphs, libraries of advanced analytic functionality, scripting language and ways of sharing findings with others, allows users to dig deeply into their data, with greater ease and speed.

similar_products.short_desc: Classify360 is a data management & governance platform for highly regulated, data-heavy industries.
similar_products.features:
Classify360 centralizes data management & governance by rapidly identifying, normalizing, and classifying data across on-prem and cloud sources - protecting data that strengthens a business and remediating the data that weakens it. 

Classify360 provides content-level visibility into protected, proprietary, public, internal, and stale data.  Through simple workflows and custodian-driven data management, organizations can mitigate risk, maintain compliance, and gain control over data sprawl.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

similar_products.short_desc: Dataddo is a data integration platform that lets users get data to wherever it needs to go - dashboards, warehouses, or business apps.
similar_products.features:
Dataddo is a no-code data integration platform that offers 3 main products:
- Data to Dashboards: Send data from apps to dashboarding tools. (Free version available)
- Data Anywhere: Send data from apps to warehouses and dashboards, between warehouses, and from warehouses into apps.
- Headless Data Integration: Build your own data product on top of the unified Dataddo API.
From first login to complete, automated pipelines, get your data flowing from sources to destinations in just a few clicks.

similar_products.short_desc: Cluvio is a modern powerful SQL and R-based cloud analytics platform that allows creating and sharing beautiful interactive dashboards.
similar_products.features: Cluvio is a modern data analytics platform that lets you run SQL queries against your database, process data in R, visualize the results and create beautiful, interactive dashboards in minutes. With pricing optimized for startups and small companies, it is easy and cost effective to share insights with everyone in your company or your customers. Cluvio also supports powerful embedding that allows you to add analytical features easily to any website or web application.

similar_products.short_desc: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data and integrate metrics where needed.
similar_products.features: Power My Analytics is a reporting automation tool that enables digital marketers to collect data from popular advertising, social media, email, shopping, CRM, and other platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Microsoft Ads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Mailchimp, Amazon, Shopify, and more, then integrate the metrics they need into their favorite data destinations, including Google Data Studio, Google Analytics, Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Google BigQuery, and/or SQL.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve alignment and uncover new insights. With Supermetrics, organizations can visualize data in customizable templates and reports.
similar_products.features:
Supermetrics streamlines the aggregation of data from 80+ sales and marketing platforms and visualizes them into customizable templates and reports.

Organizations use Supermetrics to gain data-driven insights, make better decisions, and improve alignment across departments.

Even non-technical users can rely on our connectors to create ad-hoc analyses and capture relevant data. +700k marketers use Supermetrics in over 120 countries.

similar_products.short_desc: For rapid production and analysis of presentation ready biplots, correspondence, mdpref and MCA maps.  64 bit program for PCs and MACs.
similar_products.features: The choice of professional researchers worldwide for user friendly, rapid analysis and production of presentation ready biplots, correspondence, mdpref and MCA maps. 64 bit program runs on PCs and MACs.  Our exclusive Brand Projector I calculates and graphically displays the attribute changes necessary for brand (column) re-positioning to any point on a map.  Brand Projector II allows a researcher to interactively change attributes (rows) and watch the Brand (column) move in response.

similar_products.short_desc: Industrial Internet of Things edge computing platform for Industry 4.0 data to create SCADA and visualization products.
similar_products.features:
Industrial Internet of Things edge computing platform to develop and deploy your own SCADA HMI visualization product using .NET and Web.
Data historian to MSSQL Server, SQL Azure, Oracle, mySQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, InfluxDB and CSV files.
IoT Gateway for Industry 4.0 data to Modbus, OPC DA, OPC UA Siemens S7, ControlLogix, CompactLogix, GuardLogix, Micro800, MicroLogix, SLC 500, PLC-5, and MTConnect.
Cloud computing for MQTT, Azure IoT Data Hub and Edge, and AWS IoT Gateway.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Embedded Analytics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Embedded Analytics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Embedded Analytics software allows users to integrate analytical capabilities with the applications they already use and access analytical tools from within these applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

provides visibility into daily work habits and long-term productivity trends acro

ActivTrak's employee productivity monitoring software
provides visibility into daily work habits and long-term productivity trends across remote and hybrid employees. Enable flexible schedules, ensure compliance and promote healthy work balance. Gain predictive insights that help leaders, managers, and employees build trust, deepen engagement and boost productivity in the modern, hybrid workplace.

See why more than 9,000 customers and over 550,000 users chose ActivTrak

related_products.short_desc: Employee monitoring software for tracking team availability, evenly allocate tasks and prevent overload, burnouts and missed deadlines.
related_products.features: Clockify is employee monitoring software helping you track work hours, create staff work schedules, see everyone's availability, make adjustments when allocating tasks, and control costs and overall budgets. Individual time entries become valuable data about how each day is spent and give you insights on your employees' productivity habits. You can export reports on each working week and customize which data you want to include.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Leverage Toggl Track data to boost your business. Accurately scope projects, improve resource allocation, and plan with confidence.
related_products.features:
Toggl Track is a leading time tracking team for all sizes-without invasive surveillance or monitoring features. It helps empower workers through self-awareness around hours and ensures clean and reliable data through employee buy-in.

Leverage Toggl Track data to boost your business. Accurately scope projects and pinpoint scope creep, improve staffing and team allocation, plan project budgets with confidence and ensure profitability by comparing labor costs and billable rates.

related_products.short_desc: See work happen in real-time with Hubstaff's employee monitoring software and identify productivity trends. Start a free trial today!
related_products.features: Gain clarity and peace of mind with streamlined employee monitoring and time tracking from Hubstaff. Know your team is on the right track in real-time through screenshot capture, activity monitoring, app usage, reporting, and more. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, and iOS. Hubstaff runs in the background so your team can keep working without interruption. We integrate with over 30 business apps you already use, including Jira, Trello, Asana, Github, Paypal, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Get Justworks Hours for automated, seamless time tracking. Make timekeeping effortless for you and your team.
related_products.features:
Get Justworks Hours for automated, seamless time tracking. Make timekeeping effortless for you and your team by managing employee time more easily, gaining more insights with more oversight, and easing the burden of errors and inaccuracies.

Justworks Hours is the time tracking tool anyone can use, whether your team travels for work, or heads to the same office every day, this easy-to-use solution empowers your employees to consistently track their time.

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Time tracking software - The fastest and most accurate way to track time for employees and freelancers.
related_products.features: Timely is the easiest and most accurate way to track time across teams and projects. Timely's automatic time tracking software helps companies stay connected with their workforce and report accurately on their business from billing and project management to team management and resource planning. We're 100% committed to user-level privacy by design, and therefore making Timely a tracking tool that employees and businesses actually trust.

related_products.short_desc: Connecteam is a friendly employee monitoring software for easy communication, scheduling, time tracking, training, & task management.
related_products.features: Connecteam is an employee monitoring software that allows managers to put their business on autopilot, save time and increase productivity with mobile-first custom checklists, forms, and reports; Schedule shifts and track work hours with GPS time clock; Simplify employee communication, enhance professional skills, manage daily tasks and so much more, all in one app. Start for free now!

related_products.short_desc: Employee monitoring and time tracking software for companies, teams, and freelancers.
related_products.features: Monitask delivers employee monitoring solutions to boost productivity, efficiency, and accountability across your team. Advanced screenshot and activity monitors, as well as time tracking capabilities, keep teams focused on the task at hand. Our software is powerful, yet lightweight, making it simple and easy to use. Managers can also access their dashboard on any of their devices to keep track of their team anytime, anywhere. Sign Up for Monitask and start saving time and money, today.

related_products.short_desc: Employee computer monitoring software. Track websites visited, application usage, & more. Schedule reports to be sent to your email.
related_products.features:
BrowseReporter is an employee and computer monitoring software for tracking employee computer activity. It is the ideal tool for enforcing acceptable use policies and protecting your network against unwanted computer activities.

BrowseReporter captures the websites your employees visit and the applications they use. It includes a reporting utility for generating tabular and graphical user activity reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Ekran System - an excellent employee monitoring solution for large enterprises with the most complete set of supported platforms
similar_products.features: Enhance your data security with Ekran System - enterprise-grade software for employee monitoring and insider risk management. With Ekran, you can verify user identities, manage privileged access to your critical endpoints, monitor third-party vendors, and record sessions inside and outside your protected perimeter. Ekran System perfectly fits large-scale environments due to its high availability, multi-tenancy, and load balancer support.

similar_products.short_desc: Employee computer monitoring software. Track websites visited, application usage, & more. Schedule reports to be sent to your email.
similar_products.features:
BrowseReporter is an employee and computer monitoring software for tracking employee computer activity. It is the ideal tool for enforcing acceptable use policies and protecting your network against unwanted computer activities.

BrowseReporter captures the websites your employees visit and the applications they use. It includes a reporting utility for generating tabular and graphical user activity reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Insightful is an employee monitoring tool created with your needs in mind.It has everything you need to boost your team's productivity!
similar_products.features: Insightful employee monitoring software gives you unparalleled data about your team's work habits. Take a deep dive into individual or organizational-level productivity metrics through real-time or historical data. Or use it to measure and analyze productivity and attendance through detailed reports. Companies like Farmers Insurance, Office Depot, and Allstate rely on Insightful daily to optimize the performance of their teams - will you join them?

similar_products.short_desc: Connecteam is a friendly employee monitoring software for easy communication, scheduling, time tracking, training, & task management.
similar_products.features: Connecteam is an employee monitoring software that allows managers to put their business on autopilot, save time and increase productivity with mobile-first custom checklists, forms, and reports; Schedule shifts and track work hours with GPS time clock; Simplify employee communication, enhance professional skills, manage daily tasks and so much more, all in one app. Start for free now!

similar_products.short_desc: Take a Free Trial. Employee Monitoring, Remote Management and Data Loss Prevention.  Monitor employees on the go with Mobile App.
similar_products.features: Teramind provides computer monitoring and data loss prevention software to track the behavior of employees and remote users. Our software can identify suspicious activity, detect possible threats, optimize productivity, and ensure regulatory compliance. Built-in remote desktop control (RDP), real-time alerts and logs. Take automated actions such as warning, block, lock-outs and more to keep your business running securely and efficiently. Monitor employees on the go with Android Mobile App.

similar_products.short_desc: SofTrack Managed Assets continuously monitors user engagement, including internet upload+downloads, logon activity, idleness and more.
similar_products.features: SofTrack Managed Assets continuously monitors user engagement, including internet upload+downloads, logon activity plus screen saver events, web searches, application idleness and more.  Providing full coverage for all versions of Windows, Terminal Servers, both online and offline.  Use SofTrack's SQL-based reporting to satisfy employer requirements such as HIPAA, SOX and various wage and hour regulations.  Configure scheduled graphical reports delivered via email.  Free evaluation.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based and on-premises software for employee work time usage tracking.
similar_products.features: Computer and Internet monitoring software designed for  tracking employee work time usage. Work Examiner offers both on-premises (WE Controlio, WE Standard, WE Professional) and cloud-based solutions (WE Controlio) to control in-office as well as remote employee productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: A desktop analytics monitoring solution that can give managers objective, real-time data on employee application usage.
similar_products.features: Verint Workforce Management is a desktop analytics monitoring solution that can give contact center managers objective, real-time data on employee application usage. This data helps to understand how employees are performing across all channels and locations, including work-from-anywhere employees. A "virtual" walk-around management tool that can help identify whether agents need coaching to improve performance; or if opportunities exist for increasing productivity and capacity.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Employee Monitoring Software: Screenshots, Website and Application Tracking, Timesheet Reports, Mouse and Keyboard Click Reports.
similar_products.features: Real-time employee monitoring software provides the easiest way to see what your team members are doing at the current moment, what websites they are visiting, what apps they are using and on which tasks and projects they are working. The tracker captures activity levels based on keyboard and mouse usage, takes random screenshots which help to gain full transparency, optimize time and increase productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: Kickidler is a powerful tool for automation of employees time tracking, information security and increase in business efficiency.
similar_products.features: Kickidler is the employee monitoring and user activity tracking software. It is a powerful tool for automation of control of personnel, information security and increase in business efficiency. Main Kickidler features: online monitoring of computers, recording and playback of employees history of activity, analysis of efficiency, time tracking and also violations detecting. Besides, Kickidler can be useful for optimization of communications inside the company and remote workers monitoring.

similar_products.short_desc: Accurately measure how people work with Time Doctor's workday analytics that's helped 200k+ users boost productivity by 22% on average.
similar_products.features: Time Doctor's industry-leading employee monitoring software helps you accurately measure and analyze how teams spend their time for unparalleled visibility. Uncover insights that empower everyone to improve their performance, wherever they work. Our 200k+ active users have been able to lift productivity by 22% on average. Employee-friendly automated time tracking and in-depth analytics brings transparency and accountability to the workday, so you and your teams can get better together.

similar_products.short_desc: This unique employee monitoring software allows remote computer monitoring and recording in real time.
similar_products.features:
This unique employee monitoring software allows remote computer monitoring and recording in real time. Record your employees communications, such as Email, Skype and other instant messaging. View used apps, Internet history, Facebook usage, files copied to USB drives, modified or deleted documents and more. Record a screenshot of every action like a video surveillance camera of their computer screen.
View activity in real time or record everything into Central Log Database for later review.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Computer Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Computer Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Productivity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Productivity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Productivity software facilitates creation of documents, reports and presentations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Clock software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Clock tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Clock software, also known as timesheet software, automates the tracking of employee attendance, scheduling, and vacations. Time Clock software gives organizations an overall picture of how employees spend their time as well as an analysis of labor costs on a per project basis. Time Clock software can be standalone, but often integrates with an organization's accounting software. Time Clock software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, and Workforce Management software.

The Advanced plan allows for unlimited users with a minimum requirement of 5 users. This plan is useful for managing team engagement and productivity and is billed annually. The following add-ons are available:
- ActivConnect- $2 per user/mo.
- Export & query data
- App integrations
- BI starter templates for Power BI, Google Data Studio, Tableau

pricing_plans.description: The Premium plan allows for unlimited users with a 5-user minimum. The plan is billed annually and includes activity details, group information, premium metrics, historic benchmarks, and team actuals vs goals.
